phrs.translation: 退绕, 解开, 展开, 松开
料架使用马达, 料架马达
料卷扩张, 料架扩张方式, 卷料扩张方式

sentences.sentence: The spring will not only uncoil, it will jump out of you.
sentences.translation: 弹簧不仅会打开，它将跳出你。

sentences.sentence: Dan played with the tangerine peel, letting it uncoil and then coil again.
sentences.translation: 丹摆弄着那片橘子皮，将它不停地展开来卷回去。

sentences.sentence: The products could be uncoil automatically by the uncoiler which was drove by frequency converter.
sentences.translation: 开卷机由变频器驱动，可实现对卷料的自动开卷；
